name: ractive-gauge
description: A simple UV-type meter for Ractive
author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>

scripts.js: browserify -t brfs -x ractive --standalone gauge -o dist/ractive-gauge.js index.js && uglifyjs dist/ractive-gauge.js -o dist/ractive-gauge.min.js
scripts.bump: npm run js && mversion patch -m && npm publish
